highlights: Designed, implemented, and maintained robust GraphQL APIs in TypeScript, efficiently handling personal data and credit checks.
Implemented token-based authorization to safeguard GraphQL APIs from unauthorized access, enhancing overall security.
Developed and automated comprehensive unit and end-to-end tests using Jest and Cucumber, improving code reliability and reducing bugs.
Led data migration initiatives in PostgreSQL to support the seamless release of new features, ensuring data integrity and system stability.
Designed a scalable data model for defining underwriting rules, suitable for both PostgreSQL (SQL) and GCP Datastore (NoSQL) databases, enabling precise determination of customer insurability.
Deployed applications to both Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Heroku, ensuring reliable and scalable cloud infrastructure.
Produced detailed systems design and architecture documentation using C4 and BPMN tools to enhance communication and alignment across teams.
Contributed to the enhancement of the internal CRM system built in ReactJS, providing customer support teams with real-time access to credit scores and driving history.
Configured and optimized logging, monitoring, and alerting systems in Datadog, ensuring API services consistently met predefined SLOs.
Identified and resolved critical bugs and flaky automated tests, streamlining deployment processes and minimizing downtime.
Provided actionable feedback through thorough code reviews, and produced detailed system and architectural design documentation to guide development teams.
Facilitated event storming sessions to extract business requirements and align technical solutions with organizational goals.
Developed a peer-to-peer video consultation platform using Vue, TypeScript, AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway, integrating Twilio for video and push notifications.
Using AWS Cognito, created a token and role-based authentication and authorisation logic to protect patient data and prevent unauthorized access
Designed and optimized data structures for DynamoDB, including the creation of indexes tailored to specific access patterns, ensuring efficient data retrieval.
Documented RESTful APIs using Swagger and Postman, providing clear and comprehensive API documentation for internal and external stakeholders.
Implemented automated contract tests for messaging systems using Pact, ensuring reliable and consistent communication between microservices.
Integrated internal systems with an external scheduling API, enabling seamless appointment booking for patients with doctors.
Utilized AWS CDK, SAM, and Serverless Framework for infrastructure setup, eg. SQS, EventBridge, DynamoDB, and API Gateway, ensuring scalable and maintainable deployments.
Collaborated with product and QA teams to define acceptance criteria and translate them into automated tests, enhancing release reliability.
Configured CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins to automate deployments, ensuring tests pass and coverage meets standards before production releases.
Set up logging, monitoring, and alerting in NewRelic with Slack notifications, enabling prompt responses to potential issues and maintaining system health.
Participated in code reviews, providing feedback based on software engineering best practices and contributing to overall code quality improvements.
Liaised with doctors to understand their pain points and develop targeted solutions, enhancing the user experience for medical professionals.
Hosted backend guild sessions to discuss software engineering best practices and innovations, fostering knowledge sharing and team development.

Designed and developed the entire backend infrastructure for the Framble app, leveraging RESTful APIs and event-driven microservices to create a highly scalable and robust architecture, supporting seamless user experiences.

Led the development of the Framble web app using lightweight front-end libraries HTMX and Alpine.js, ensuring a fast, responsive, and intuitive user interface that significantly improved user engagement.
Integrated with an external payment gateway provider to facilitate card payments.
Provided support to the iOS team by providing Swagger documentation with example responses.
Automated deployment processes using GitHub Actions, deploying backend systems and web applications to AWS and DigitalOcean, resulting in faster and more reliable release cycles.
Setup DNS configuration in Cloudflare
Managed the projects kanban board in Jira, formulating user stories for development.
Set up and managed cloud hosting environments on AWS and DigitalOcean, including configuring IAM roles and organization accounts, enhancing security and operational efficiency.

Led the hiring process for junior developers and a UI/UX designer, growing the team and enhancing overall development capabilities. Managed project timelines and priorities by overseeing the Kanban board in Jira.
Collaborated directly with the CEO to define the product roadmap and prioritize features, ensuring alignment with business goals and timely delivery of key milestones.

projects.name: Framble
keywords: AWS - Lambda, DynamoDB, EventBridge, SQS, Cognito
projects.description: A social gambling and challenge app
